---
title: "RStudio Bugs"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(gh)
library(ggplot2)
source("gh-util.R")
```

```{r}
issues <- gh_all("/repos/rstudio/rstudio/issues?assignee=*&state=all")
message("Read ", length(issues), " issues")
```

```{r}
extract_gh_date <- function(issue, field) {
  date <- issue[[field]]
  if (is.null(date))
    NA
  else
    date
}

allbugs <- data.frame(
  id = unlist(lapply(issues, `[[`, "number")),
  created = as.Date(unlist(lapply(issues, extract_gh_date, "created_at"))),
  closed = as.Date(unlist(lapply(issues, extract_gh_date, "closed_at"))),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
ggplot(allbugs, aes(x = created)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  xlab("Date created") +
  ylab("Number of issues") +
  ggtitle("New issues over time")
```
